code: import React from'react';import'./ProgressBar.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProgressBar=_ref=>{let{currentStep}=_ref;const steps=[{id:'address',label:'Verify Address'},{id:'payment',label:'Payment Information'},{id:'otp',label:'OTP Verification'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"progress-container",children:steps.map((step,index)=>{const isCompleted=steps.findIndex(s=>s.id===currentStep)>index;const isActive=step.id===currentStep;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(React.Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"progress-step",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`step-circle ${isCompleted?'completed':''} ${isActive?'active':''}`,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:index+1})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"step-label",children:step.label})]}),index<steps.length-1&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`progress-connector ${isCompleted?'completed':''}`})]},step.id);})});};export default ProgressBar;
